title: Stormwatch - The Authority
description:
This torrent includes all volume 1 and 2 of Stormwatch, all issues and volumes of The Authority, spinoffs including Midnighter and Midnighter/Grifter. Also includes Wildstorm one-shots, and crossovers, the Kev series, Keith Giffen and Grant Morrison's "The Lost Year". I am also including the Armageddon/Revelations/Number of the Beast trilogy, which led into Authority Volume 5. This also includes all issues published to date in the current DC=New 52 version, which reverted back to the name Stormwatch. All thanks go to the original scanners, and (as usual) to my OCD.

Cheers, and enjoy!
